main.name: Alex Abram
main.description: I live on the East Side with my two chocolate labs. I am currently a full time student enrolled in Vanderbilt University's Full Stack Coding Bootcamp
main.bio: With an education in full-stack development, I am looking to focus on the backend and to create functional and intuitive solutions.
main.contactmessage: Want to get in contact with me directly? Feel free to reach out via my cell, email, or the form below.

work.title: Intern
work.description: Assisted the special servicing department with the management of REO assets. Analyzed figures and generated hold/sale reports using Excel.

testimonials.text: Every problem has a solution. You just have to be creative enough to find it.
